combat.__comment: The maximum number that a 'combat roll' can randomize to. It's like throwing dice with that many faces... Conveniently 20 by default.
The default value that will be used for the 'muscle' attribute if the attacker has no specific values. Default: 18
The default difficult for hitting a target that has no specific values. Default: 12
The default value for awareness when calculating dodges. Default: 25
The minimum value by which damage is multiplied on a critical hit. Default: 2
The maximum value by which damage is multiplied on a critical hit. Default: 3
The percentage above or below the total calculated damage that the final damage can fluctuate between through RNG. Default: 0.1

attribute_effects.__comment: The default chance for a critical hit when the attacker has no specific attributes. Default: 0.05
The sum of the attack proficiency attribute (Dex, Muscle, etc...) multiplied by all multipliers will then be multiplied by this. Default: 0.1
An entity is unable to attempt a dodge if their 'Speed' is under this value. Default: 20
What % of the awareness attribute will weigh on the dodge roll. Default: 0.1
What % of the speed attribute will multiply the entirety of the dodge bonus. Default: 0.01
